item.title: Finscore
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The Philippines’ leading alternative credit scoring provider that utilizes telco and social data to determine creditworthiness for the unbanked, recently acquired by Malaysia’s CTOS Digital
